articles.title: What does it mean to recreate your old home in a video game?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
When and where did the Steam demo for horror game New Life first find its way to me? When did its non-descript, black hooded protagonist first wriggle, with the transgressive delight of an unbidden slug between naked toes embarking on a 2am fridge odyssey, into the as yet uncolonised crevices of my ‘demos’ library? The specifics, I fear, are but the fumes of memories, lingering like armies of mice in trenchcoats at supermarket cheese sample platters, at once painfully obvious and immune to detection in their uncanny shroud of stifling human decorum. "For who is madder?!" I shout, in a normal and cool manner. "The mice - so very mad for cheese - or the madmen who screams ‘Mice! Mice!’ in the middle of the cheese aisle?!"
And if I can’t remember how it got here, how can I make it go away?
Read more
articles.title: I want to remove this horrible demo from my Steam library, but my body won’t let me

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
A studio led by former Mass Effect director Casey Hudson have shut down before being able to show the sci-fi narrative adventure they were working on. Humanoid Origin posted the announcement of the studio's closure on LinkedIn yesterday, saying that a "shortfall of funding" was responsible for the decision. They had been making a "multi-platform AAA game, focusing on character-driven narrative in an all-new science-fiction universe", according to the studio's website.
Read more
articles.title: Former Mass Effect director cancels his next sci-fi game as his studio closes before it is fully revealed

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Many are the horror games that involve you going down. Down is where much of the Badness in the world is traditionally located, after all, whether you're talking about geology or psychology or theology. White Knuckle reverses the flow. You are already Down; by extrapolation, you must now go Up.
Possibly, you are Down because you are a manifestation of the aforementioned Badness. Possibly, the monstrous things trying to thwart your ascent are merely trying to stop you contaminating the surface world. Possibly, they are the Real Heroes. It doesn't really matter, because you don't have a choice. There is a wall of unspeakable flesh coming up the tunnel behind you. To avoid becoming part of it, you must climb.
 
Read more
articles.title: If Amnesia: The Dark Descent were actually Amnesia: The Dark Ascent, it would be White Knuckle

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
I’ve always liked the Razer Basilisk V3 Pro mouse, a lightweight wireless version of the equally comfortable and responsive Basilisk V3. Yet it’s usually been just a few tenners too expensive for me to say "You, RPS reader, buy this", and since telling people what to buy is around 40% of this job, well, that just leaves a peripheral-shaped hole in my heart.
 Read more
articles.title: One of my favourite wireless gaming mice is £60 / $60 off in the early Black Friday sales

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
"James, please don’t just make half your Black Friday deal posts about Steam Deck stuff again", warns a steely-eyed Graham. "I won’t", I reply in sing-song while quietly adding pictures of the JSAUX ModCase to the CMS. That’s right, Amazon and a bunch of other retails have launched their BF sales a week early, which is annoying, unless you’re in the market for a Steam Deck case upgrade. If so, consider the compact, multifunctional ModCase, which is down to just £24 / $24. That makes for savings of 33% and 20% respectively, on what was already a nicely affordable alternative to the luxury of Dbrand’s similar Project Killswitch.
Read more
articles.title: Let the Black Friday Steam Deck deals continue, with up to 33% off the clever JSAUX ModCase

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The enemies of survival shooter Stalker 2 have a funny habit of showing up right behind you, like a panto villain with an AK-47. Far from being a premeditated ambush by intelligent AI-controlled soldiers, this is just a result of the game's janky spawns. Those botched encounters are unlike previous games, where roaming bands of factional murderfolk would patrol the radioactive wastes, seemingly according to their own whims. Back in the day, this wandering baddies feature was dubbed "A-life" by developers GSC Game World - basically a jargon word for the simulation of enemies that would lead to "emergent" moments of violence and conflict. It was promised as a feature in Stalker 2 but many players have noticed it seems to be absent. Over the weekend, GSC insisted the simulation is technically present in the sequel. It's just broken.
Read more
articles.title: Stalker 2 devs insist complex AI simulation of enemy patrols is in the game - it's just broken

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
If you’re a fan of Warhammer 40k, you know John Blanche. Even if it’s you’re first time hearing his name, you’ll be familiar with his fingerprints on some of the setting’s most defining artwork. He’s responsible for that iconic imagine of the emprah - the one the best shows off the dark irony of a such a wretched figure becoming an idol of worship. While the term ‘grimdark’ originates from 40k’s "in the grim darkness of the far future…" tagline, grimdark as an aesthetic is one Blanche pioneered. There’s even a style of miniature painting - Blanchitsu - named after him.
Basically, even games that don’t use the 40k license owe an incredible amount to Blanche’s work. That’s not to mention his influence on the fantasy setting of the Total War: Warhammer series either. His piece Harry The Hammer was the cover for the first edition of Fantasy Battle - recently added to the strategy game as chaos hero Harold Hammerstorm. I could go on, and I might do so in a bit, but here’s the news: Trademark Films are making a documentary on Blanche’s work, starring Napoleon Dynamite actor Jon Heder. It’s called The Grim And The Dark: The Search For John Blanche, and it’s out next Spring. Here’s a trailer:
Read more
articles.title: Napoleon Dynamite is making a documentary about the artist that inspired your favourite Warhammer games

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Microsoft have "applied a compatibility hold" to – i.e., blocked the installation of – a new Windows 11 update that’s causing havoc with certain Ubisoft games. Star Wars Outlaws, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora are among the weirdly publisher-specific victims of Windows 11 version 24H2, which by Microsoft’s admission (well spotted, Bleeping Computer) is causing crashes and crap performance in the affected games. Even after, in Outlaws’ case, Ubisoft responded to the complaints with their own patch.
Read more
articles.title: Microsoft have blocked their own Windows 11 update after it started breaking Ubisoft games

articles.author: Craig Munro
articles.description:
You may have noticed some recent changes to our commenting system. I want to explain what has been happening.
 Read more
articles.title: Recent changes to our comments system

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Manor Lords developer Greg Styczeń, aka Slavic Magic, has emerged from his keep with news of a forthcoming patch for the medieval city builder. It'll add new maps, building upgrades and reworks for various economic systems.
The announcement post is mostly image-based, in keeping with the classic saying that "a picture is worth a thousand words, as long as the words in question are mostly synonyms for 'hut', 'mud', 'tree' and 'mountain'". Fortunately, Styczeń threw in a few captions to light the way.
 Read more
articles.title: Manor Lords is getting new maps, building upgrades and reworks for the marketplace and ale distribution

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Stalker 2: Heart Of Chornobyl has been in the wild for almost a week now, and it’s a great, if predictably somewhat shonky time, is the word on the street. Literally, that’s what the streets are saying. “It’s good! A bit shonky, though!” opined my postman this morning, enunciating each syllable by yanking the package further from my grasp. “Don’t worry!” I said. “A patch for the FPS is coming next week”. “That’s cheered me right up, that has! Thank god for games journalists!” he replied. Then the whole street started cheering and bringing me various baked goods. It was a delicious time, and here’s the notes from the delicious patch:
 
Read more
articles.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2’s first patch is coming next week, though my favourite parts are still the imperfections

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The Maw doesn't hibernate, but it does... decelerate. As the year fades, its seismic pulse slows from Gatling-gun prestissimo to howitzer larghissimo. Its compound eyes contract or dim or vanish entirely. Its limbs lengthen, forming contrails from the Arctic to Antarctica (what, did you think those were from planes? Haha. Hahahaha.) Accordingly, news writing becomes a kind of lullaby. Softly now - which promising new PC games are out this week?
 Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Hello reader who is also a reader, and welcome back to Booked For The Week - our regular Sunday chat with a selection of cool industry folks about books! This week, it’s Looking Glass Studios’ legend, Deus Ex director, and Otherside’s Warren Spector - who I suspect might have realised the very secret goal of this column. Cheers Warren! Mind if we have a nose at your bookshelf?
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?:  Deus Ex, Looking Glass Studios, and Otherside’s Warren Spector

articles.author: Joe O’Neill-Parker
articles.description:
If you want to bump up the storage for your Switch or Steam Deck, then Black Friday is going to be a fantastic time to do just that.
 Read more
articles.title: The best Steam Deck microSD card just got a huge Black Friday discount

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Sundays are for sitting in a chair, I hope. Beyond that I dare not to dream.

Folks continue to sing the praises of Arco, this year's selected overlooked gem of overlooked gems. The latest is Matt Patches over at Polygon:

 
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Here in the UK, the weekend window views are getting progressively more glacial. I'm a bit glad not to have any particular reason to go outside this weekend. It's been a hell of a week wading through anomalies for me, and I'm looking forward to some relaxation. What about you? Give me a rating out of 100 for how relaxed your weekend looks to be. Decimals allowed. Let's really get specific here.
Meanwhile, here's what we'll be clicking on this weekend!
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
A little teaser story to end the week, care of Maw reader MiniMatt. Factorio devs Wube Software have dropped the vaguest of hints about their next game project, or at least, shared one of their current inspirations: World Of Warcraft.
Read more
articles.title: The Factorio dev's next game may take inspiration from World Of Warcraft

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
That there are more than 100 entire PC games is a revelation as shocking as it is disturbing, but despite recently spending days translating Horace’s sonorous yawps into the list that eventually became our RPS 100, a chill silence recently befell the treehouse when we realised that some of our personal favourites had somehow been excluded. Determined to right this most heinous of wrongs, and armed with the conviction that no subjectivity be allowed to exist on the internet without at least one supplementary article of caveats, we’ve all put forth a single game that absolutely should have made the list. Consider the matter closed, then, at least until we all realise we’d actually like to do a 102nd pick each.
Read more
articles.title: The RPS 101rd best game on PC

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Helldivers 2 developers Arrowhead have been voluble lately about potentially adding elements from other sci-fi worlds to the shooter, with chief creative officer Johan Pilestedt rubbing his hands gleefully at the prospect of partnerships with Warhammer, Alien, the Fifth Element, and more besides. Speaking at the G-STAR Conference in Busan earlier this month, recently appointed chief executive officer Shams Jorjani confirmed that Arrowhead are looking into such collaborations, giving the example of refitting your dropship to look like one of Halo's Pelicans, or introducing the Zerg from Blizzard's Starcraft as an enemy faction. 
Jorjani cautioned listeners, however, that these injections of third-party DNA need to look and feel appropriate to the setting. After all, if you start fecklessly chucking the Zerg, Chaos Space Marines or Fifth Element's, er, flying taxis into Helldivers 2, it might spoil the meticulous coherency of a game in which saluting protects you against lethal falls and some guy called Joel is running the universe. The funny part is that according to Jorjani, Arrowhead once envisaged a system that would get round the problem of inconsistency by essentially making third-party cosmetics, including whole map skins, visible only to players who have them enabled. To put that another way, Arrowhead once envisaged a system in which individual Helldivers would hallucinate other licenses.
  
Read more
articles.title: Helldivers 2 devs once considered a licensed cosmetic system that basically let you hallucinate a different world

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The mutant enemies in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl are very hungry. Hungry not only for your flesh, but also all the bullets in your AK-47. It can take entire clips of ammo to take down some of these tough beasts, and you get nothing back for killing this wildlife except the hollow satisfaction of pest control. Alongside the bugs and performance issues, it's a common enough complaint to players of the first-person survival shooter that it's already been addressed by a modder, who has created a tweak to lower the health of various dogs, boars, and bloodsuckers. 
Read more
articles.title: Stalker 2's bulletsponge mutants can be nerfed with this handy mod, saving you precious rounds

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Long before Hideo Kojima made the first triple-A walking simulator, he was trying to spin sunlight into bullets. The game in question, Boktai: The Sun Is In Your Hand, is a Game Boy Advance title from 2003, in which you play a vampire-slaying gunslinger. The gun you're slinging is a "solar-powered" pistol, which you could charge up using a cartridge-mounted photometric sensor by physically standing in sunshine. This was 13 years before the launch of Pokemon Go. Sadly, Boktai's debut didn't result in city parks or rooftops being flooded by crowds of GBA-wielding undead killers. But it was a fun gimmick and the game itself is good enough to carry it - an isometric dungeon-crawler in which you have to find a vamp's coffin and drag it to the surface for purgation.
 Read more
articles.title: Kura5 is a free spiritual successor to Kojima's sun-loving Boktai vampire-hunting series

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Upon some serious soul searching following a little time with the early access build of open world game Vivat Slovakia, I have unfortunately had to admit to myself that it is probably not the GTA 6 killer I was hoping for. This upsets me slightly, because I find Rockstar’s constant self-assured bloviating to be quite irritating, even though I’m sure I’ll play their game for a billion hours. What Vivat Slovakia is, then, is a very ambitious homage to the Grand Theft Auto series that isn’t shy about it, right down to the font choices. I’m not sure if you should play it, but I do feel enriched for learning of its existence. Here’s a trailer.
Read more
articles.title: I no longer care about Grand Theft Auto 6, for I have the open world of Vivat Slovakia

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Kill The Man In The House is a video game title I can get behind. It tells me exactly what I need to do before I even boot up the game, which is otherwise powerfully weird-looking. The cover art is reminiscent of a children's book, if it were for adults. Or a lost episode of Ed Edd and Eddy, where a fourth older sibling (Eddie) acts on his murderous intent and engages in some slick FPSing. Either way, there's a demo out on Steam and despite being very short and limited, I am excited for its future.
Read more
articles.title: You'll never guess what you do in Kill The Man In The House

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The Hobbit movies are a mixed Baggins indeed - at once thunderous and thin, like butter scraped over too much bread - but one sequence I love from The Desolation of Smaug is Bilbo searching Erebor for the Arkenstone, while trying not to rouse the titular dragon from his slumber. Don't Wake The Beast is sort of that sequence plus Spelunkified procgen levels and Thief-esque stealth mechanics.
Read more
articles.title: Don't Wake The Beast is a blend of Thief and Spelunky where you must let sleeping dragons lie

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
If the surprising number of you brought scurrying out of the woodwork by the announcement of Redwall-style survival game Hawthorn is anything to go by, the medieval rodent fanatic to RPS reader pipeline is a sturdy one, despite being constantly nibbled at. Here’s some more delicious bait for you, then. Mossflower TW is a campaign mod for Medieval II: Total War expansion Kingdoms that lets ranks of mace-wielding mice, helmeted hedgehogs, and ornery otters skitter wildly all over the venerable strategy game. It’s been about since Summer, and the team have been working on patching since. It seems very playable, if the footage of people playing it is anything to go by. Here’s a video by YouTuber Tharshey so you can see it in action:
Read more
articles.title: Turn Medieval II: Total War into Redwall with this Mossflower TW mod

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Various games in the Shiren The Wanderer (and Mystery Dungeon) series have been recommended to me over and over, but I've yet to play any of them. I likely won't play the next, either. Shiren The Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon Of Serpentcoil Island is headed to PC via Steam soon.

 
Read more
articles.title: The first new Shiren The Wanderer game in 14 years is headed to PC

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows is making changes to how it handles stealth, versus other games in the long-running series. Gone is the companion eagle who can spot enemies for you, for a start; instead, players can hide in the - hey - shadows, lie on their tummies for the first time, and make use of a "shinobi and assassin arsenal" of smoke bombs and bells.

There are old moves that are coming back after an absence, too: Shadows will allow for 'double assassinations' again.

 
Read more
articles.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows outlines its stealth systems - which luckily includes the ability to hide in shadows

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Star Wars Outlaws' stealth has been much debated, though not hotly. Some people think it's rubbish, some others think it's basically fine. Ubisoft themselves seem to think it's one of the key issues with the game, with the creative director previously saying the forced stealth sections are "incredibly punishing".

Now there's a new patch, apparently Outlaws' biggest yet, and stealth and combat are firmly in the crosshairs. The AI and player detection has changed; you can now choose combat in areas where it was previously not allowed; and enemies have had weak points added, for those who wish to cause massive damage.

 
Read more
articles.title: Star Wars Outlaws' latest patch is out and aims to make stealth and combat more satisfying

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I go through this life burdened by the knowledge that I will never be framed for murder on a luxurious, multiple-day train journey. Not for me the thrill of flushing out the true culprit (or culprits???) between visits to the exquisitely upholstered dining car, against the backdrop of passing mountains. The best I can hope for is getting chewed out for hogging the toilet on a crowded commuter train to Leeds.
 Read more
articles.title: The jazz is as smooth as the spritework in murder mystery Loco Motive, out now

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl stays largely faithful to the original series’ bleak yet inquisitive tone and propensity for technical problems, but there’s another, much smaller feature that it also brings back: silly titles for its lesser NPCs. All the major and side characters are, indeed, characters, but rather than leave inconsequential henchmen and roving bandits nameless, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 assigns Zone-merc handles to each and every one of them. Some try to sound badass, some might as well have been chosen by the owner panickedly looking around the room for something to name himself after, and all of them sound like they should be on the actor's wall in Toast of London.
Because your life partly depends on relieving slain foes of their belongings, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 encourages you to get up close and looty with these blokes, meaning you end up spending a lot of time reading goofy nicknames. I thought I’d pay tribute to the best ones I’ve seen so far, even if the majority of these honours will need to be given posthumously.
Read more
articles.title: If one thing works in S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2, it’s the incomprehensible name generator for random NPCs

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: GMP (GNU MP nebo též libgmp) je matematická knihovna pro práci v libovolné přesnosti. Podíváme se na racionální čísla a čísla s plovoucí desetinnou čárkou. Ukážeme si jejich přiřazování a základní aritmetické operace.
articles.title: Knihovna GMP: racionální čísla a čísla s plovoucí desetinnou čárkou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Většina příkladů, které jsme si až doposud ukazovali, využívala pouze instrukce a registry dostupné na původních mikroprocesorech 8086 a 8088. Ovšem možnosti instrukčních sad se postupně s příchodem dalších čipů řady x86 rozšiřovaly.
articles.title: Vývoj mikroprocesorů z rodiny 80×86: od Intelu 8086 k čipu 80286

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle pravidelných pondělních Postřehů se podíváme na nedávný vývoj okolo nového zákona o kybernetické bezpečnosti, první UEFI bootkit pro Linux nebo obcházení antivirů s pomocí herního enginu.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: zákon o kybernetické bezpečnosti o krok blíže schválení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: SUSE pokračuje ve změně značky a přejmenovává produkty. The Bread Code je obsáhlý open-source návod vlastní kváskový chleba. Nedávno vydaný elementary OS 8, postavený na Ubuntu 24.04 LTS a poháněný jádrem 6.8, přináší řadu vylepšení.
articles.title: SUSE přejmenovává produkty, kváskový chleba pod svobodnou licencí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE a vypínatelná pravidla KWin, LibreOffice 25.2 na přelomu ledna/února, vyšla první alfa, nová verze Tails 6.10 přinášející aktuální prohlížeč i poštovního klienta s vypnutou telemetrií.
articles.title: BIOS tuning pro nové AMD EPYC a AI, jádro 6.13 odstraňuje neudržované ovladače

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Šéfka projektu elementary OS, Danielle Foréová, informuje o vydání již osmé verze této linuxové distribuce snažící se co nejvíce přiblížit uživatelskému zážitku z Apple macOS. Novinek není zrovna málo.
articles.title: Distribuce elementary OS 8 aneb Linux oblečený v kabátku macOS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Komprese dat má za cíl zmenšit objem nebo datový tok dat. Bez komprese by např. běžná digitální fotografie měla desítky megabajtů. Je tedy velmi žádoucí taková multimediální data komprimovat.
articles.title: Algoritmy pro kompresi dat: entropická kódování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V dnešním článku dokončíme popis vlastností tenzorů. Ukážeme si, jaké operace je možné s tenzory provádět, ať již se jedná o operace prováděné prvek po prvku, o takzvaný broadcasting nebo o komplikovanější činnosti.
articles.title: Manipulace s tenzory v knihovně PyTorch (dokončení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Eischmann)
articles.description: Když Apple uvedl vlastní čipsety pro své počítače, linuxová komunita rozjela projekt Asahi Linux a začala pracovat na tom, aby na tomto hardwaru běžel i Linux. Jak se Asahi instaluje a je použitelný?
articles.title: Asahi Linux na počítači od Apple: instalace a zkušenosti z provozu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se společně podíváme na unifikovaný nástroj pro práci s repozitáři v GitHub a GitLab, budeme hromadně posílat HTTP požadavky a nakonec si představíme nový webový prohlížeč.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (27. 11. 2024): testujte automaticky HTTP(S) servery

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Intel v pondělí oznámila, že odstoupil její generální ředitel Pat Gelsinger. Finanční ředitel společnosti David Zinsner a šéfka Client Computing Group Michelle Johnston Holthausová se budou dělit o funkci dočasného generálního ředitele, zatímco správní rada společnosti bude hledat nového generálního ředitele. Gelsinger rovněž odstoupil ze svého místa v představenstvu.
articles.title: Pat Gelsinger odstoupil z funkce ředitele Intelu po velmi neúspěšném období

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Každé nové vydání Fedory znamená konec podpory pro verzi, která byla uvolněna před rokem. Po nedávném uvedení Fedory 41 tedy nastal čas se rozloučit s verzí 39, která přestala dostávat aktualizace k 26. listopadu.
articles.title: Fedora 39 už nemá podporu, je čas přejít na novější verzi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Zajímáte se o techniku, ale nemáte ve svém okolí s kým si o ní pokecat? Pak dorazte 3. prosince na strahováckou Virtuální Bastlírnu, kde si můžete neformálně online popovídat s ostatními makery, hackery, hardwaráři, softwaráři, ale třeba i vědci a vysokoškolskými učiteli. Samozřejmě pro případy, kdyby řeč stála, mají bastlíři nachystaná i aktuální témata k nastartování diskuze. Jaká to jsou pro prosinec?
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 45: jak se pracuje s novým FreeCADem?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Štrobl)
articles.description: Síťování je složité téma o kterém se dá povídat celé hodiny a pořád nebudete mít dost. Ale co teprve síťování v Kubernetes? To je teprve něco a taktéž je to téma dalšího Cloud Native Prague meetupu, který se bude tématicky konat v kancelářích Cisco na Pankráci.
articles.title: Cloud Native Prague #19: o síťování v Kubernetes

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pitva)
articles.description: Advent of Code je adventní kalendář logických programátorských hádanek, který probíhá každý rok od 1. do 25. prosince. Pro řešitele jsou každý den připraveny dvě úlohy, které kombinují kreativní myšlení a kódování. Hádanky jsou provázány tématickým příběhem a účastníci získávají za jejich vyřešení hvězdy, které příběhovou linku rozvíjejí a posouvají kupředu.
articles.title: Advent of Code 2024: adventní kalendář pro programátory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Portál Identity občana (původně Národní identitní autorita, NIA) se během víkendu přestěhoval na novou doménu pod gov.cz. Digitální a informační agentura (DIA) tento krok urychlila v reakci na rostoucí počet falešných webových stránek. Na doméně gov.cz již také operují Portál občana a Portál veřejné správy. DIA nadále doporučuje, aby uživatelé kontrolovali odkazy či adresy, přes které na portály vstupují. Jediné správné adresy jsou: identita.gov.cz, obcan.portal.gov.cz a portal.gov.cz.
articles.title: Identita občana se přesunula na doménu gov.cz, bojuje tím proti podvodným webům

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Automatizace pomocí continuous integration přímo v Gitlabu. CI vám pomůže automatizovat rutinní procesy a ušetří vám hromadu času. Pomůže vám od automatického testování, buildy po nasazování. Chcete vědět víc? Přijďte na naše školení GitLab CI, které se uskuteční 17. prosince a proběhne online. Školí Ondřej Sika, zkušený vývojář, konzultant DevOps a lektor.
articles.title: Gitlab CI: automatizujte přímo v Gitlabu (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili Xfce 4.20 Pre2, což by měla být poslední testovací verze před ostrým vydáním. Byly opraveny některé dříve objevené chyby a probíhá poslední ladění. Vydání Xfce 4.20 je v tuto chvíli naplánováno na 15. prosince. Proběhl také výběr pozadí plochy, přišlo celkem 54 návrhů od 18 uživatelů.
articles.title: Xfce 4.20 vyjde za dva týdny, ladí se poslední detaily

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Směrovač OpenWrt One, který byl představen začátkem října, je nyní běžně dostupný. Jedná se o otevřený hardware vyvinutý v rámci projektu OpenWrt ve spolupráci s výrobcem Banana Pi. Deska je založená na SoC MediaTek MT7981B (Filogic 820) a dvoupásmové čipové sadě MediaTek MT7976C WiFi 6.
articles.title: OpenWrt One se začal prodávat za 89 dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Práve sa začína nový ročník Advent of Cyber 2024. Ide o vedomostnú súťaž, ktorá zábavnou formou uvádza záujemcov do problematiky počítačovej bezpečnosti.
articles.title: Vedomostná súťaž Advent of Cyber 2024

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na serveru GOG.com je možné zdarma získat hru Oaken. Jde o rougelike tahovou strategii v mystickém světě ve větvích velkého dubu.
articles.title: Hra zdarma na GOG.com Oaken

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V nedávném článku jsme popsali, jak zapnutí „fake“ NUMA na Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 pomáhá výkonu. Bylo k tomu potřeba testovací jádro. To se však nyní dostalo běžnou aktualizací ke všem uživatelům. Jde o jádro 6.6.62 s datem sestavení 25. listopadu. Uživatelům stačí již jen nastavit podle článku do bootloaderu SDRAM_BANKLOW=. Postup s aktualizací jádra sudo rpi-update je možné vynechat. Je ale možná potřeba ručně aktualizovat samotný bootloader (což dělá také rpi-update) pomocí sudo rpi-eeprom-update -a. Po restartu by se mělo objevit více NUMA uzlů a výkon by měl být vyšší.
articles.title: Jádro s podporou NUMA v Raspberry Pi 4 a 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: O rychlém linkeru Mold jsme tu již psali. Jeho vývojář Rui Ueyama včera poslal do LKML návrhy, jak zrychlit linuxové jádro. Všiml si totiž, že při linkování LLVM/clang, který má asi 4 GB, to trvá 2,8 sekundy, ale při přepisování starého souboru jen 1,8 sekund.
articles.title: Vývojář linkeru Mold by chtěl zrychlit jádro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Mozilla dodává linuxové binárky pro Linux historicky v archivu tar.bz2 například Firefox 133.0. Před čtyřmi roky se objevil návrh na změnu na modernější tar.zst nebo tar.xz. Včera bylo nakonec vybráno řešení s tar.xz. Sice se pomaleji rozbaluje, ale je menší, než modernější zstd.
articles.title: Mozilla mění linuxové balíčky z tar.bz2 na tar.xz

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ministerstvo spravedlnosti USA tlačí Google do prodeje prohlížeče Chrome a možná i operačního systému Android kvůli monopolnímu postavení na trhu vyhledávání online. Jestli se to povede, bude to srovnatelné s koncem monopolu AT&T v roce 1982.
articles.title: Jestli Google bude muset prodat Chrome, bude jeho cena až 20 miliard dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Git je moderní distribuovaný verzovací systém, který umožňuje efektivní správu kódu. Umožňuje spolupráci na projektech, automatizaci pracovních postupů pomocí CI/CD a sledování změn. Naučte se, jak používat Git efektivně na našem školení verzovacího systému Git.
articles.title: Git pro každého: naučte se spravovat kód efektivně na našem školení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Mezi různými nápravnými opatřeními, která navrhlo Ministerstvo spravedlnosti Spojených států amerických k řešení zneužívání monopolního postavení společnosti Google, je také zákaz platit za to, aby se Google stal výchozím vyhledávačem v jiných zařízeních, platformách nebo aplikacích.
articles.title: Mozilla prosí soudy, aby povolily Googlu platit za výchozí vyhledávač ve Firefoxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost ESET objevila první bootkit pro UEFI (Unified Extensible Firmware Interface) určený speciálně pro linuxové systémy s názvem Bootkitty. Umožňuje útočníkům vypnout funkci ověřování podpisu jádra a při bootu pak zavést dva binární soubory ELF prostřednictvím init systému. Jejich prostřednictvím je pak možné do jádra přidat vlastní modul a tím zcela ovládnout systém.
articles.title: Bootkitty je první UEFI bootkit určený pro Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byl uvolněn elementary OS 8, postavený na základu Ubuntu 24.04 LTS a poháněný linuxovým jádrem 6.8. Přináší řadu vylepšení jak v desktopovém prostředí Pantheon, tak ve svých základních aplikacích a elegantním uživatelském prostředí.
articles.title: Vyšel elementary OS 8 s novým dokem, rychlým nastavením a bezpečnou relací

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Phoronix v několika testech porovnal výpočetní (nikoli herní) výkon integrovaného grafického jádra Xe2 v nejnovějších mobilních procesorech Intel Lunar Lake s předchozí generací Xe v Meteor Lake. V řadě testů jde o nárůst o velké desítky procent, byť jistě i díky vyššímu nastavení spotřeby notebooku.
articles.title: Oproti Meteor Lake je iGPU v Lunar Lake ve výpočtech o polovinu rychlejší

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Amazonu na chvíli unikly dva modely od ASRocku, a tak můžeme říci, že druhá generace „velkých“ grafických karet Intel je těsně před uvedením. Prvním modelem na trhu bude Arc B580, který by číselně naznačoval zhruba střední segment, nicméně s ohledem na absenci zmínek o „sedmistovkové“ řadě a dřívějších neoficiálních informací, podle kterých Intel nejvyšší verzi zrušil, lze předpokládat, že B580 je aktuálním stropem.
articles.title: Intel Arc B580, Xe2 generaci grafických karet Intel Battlemage prozradil Amazon a ASRock

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Kubernetes je dnes nejrozšířenější platformou na hostovaní Docker kontejnerů a je podporován velkými hráči na trhu (Google, Amazon, Microsoft) skrz Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Kuberneres pro provoz používají všechny velikosti firem, od startupu po korporace. Pojďme se naučit jej používat na dvoudenním kurzu Úvod do Kubernetes, který proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti ve dnech 9. a 10. prosince. Školení proběhne pouze online.
articles.title: Naučte se Kubernetes na našem dvoudenním školení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Dnes bylo oznámeno vydání Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5, což je modulární verze jednodeskového počítače Raspberry Pi 5, který je na trhu přibližně rok. Cena nové desky je 45 dolarů a stejně jako její starší sourozenci umožňuje zabudování do rozsáhlejších embedded řešení.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 je nyní v prodeji za 45 dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: GIMP 1.0 vyšel 1998, GIMP 2.0 vyšel 2004, GIMP 2.10 vyšel 2018 a od té doby už má tahle řada celkem 18 vydání, ale díky prvnímu kandidátovi na GIMP 3.0, novou hlavní verzi, se snad tato mizérie chýlí ke konci a i Ubuntu jej vyhlíží a pro nejbližší jarní vydání už počítá s GIMPem 3.0.x.
articles.title: Ubuntu 25.04 nabídne příští rok GIMP 3.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Richard Hughes z Red Hatu oznámil vydání nové verze balíku Fwupd 2.0.2 pro aktualizace firmwarů na Linuxu. Přináší podporu kontroly nastavení AMD MSR, emulace enumerate-only a podporu přeposílání JSON namísto ZIP v rámci podpory emulace, naopak mizí podpora zastaralých zařízení CSR DFU / Nitrokey. Opraveno je též několik chyb.
articles.title: Fwupd 2.0.2 s komunitní podporou Asus ROG ALLY a ROG ALLY X

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Bez člověka u počítače kvalitní AI nevybudujete, říká regionální šéf Dell Technologies. Agenti AI a lidé budou společně pracovat na úspěchu u zákazníků. GFI Software: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva. Nový Red Hat Device Edge snižuje latenci a zefektivňuje úlohy AI na okraji sítě. Portworx umožní zrychlení úloh v systému Kubernetes. Fortinet posiluje umělou inteligenci u ochrany dat a řízení vnitřních rizik.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Jsme u výprodeje na Black Friday. Ceny u Goodoffer24 jsou opravdu skvělé, když se podíváte na standardní koupi jejich doživotních licencí. Během výprodeje na Black Friday je cena výrazně snížena jak pro Windows, tak pro Office, zejména u klíče na  Windows 11, což je dnes nejoblíbenější produkt.
articles.title: Jen jednou za rok můžete na Black Friday získat u Goodoffer24 doživotní licenci na Windows 11 za €20 a Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 48/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Exotická fyzika neutronových hvězd. Scénář temného velkého třesku. Astronomové pořídili první detailní snímek hvězdy mimo naši Galaxii.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Čipové války

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nová generace all-flash úložišť OceanStor Dorado pro éru AI. HPE představuje jednotnou správu virtualizace, nové rychlé objektové úložiště a izolované privátní cloudy. Dell Technologies urychluje AI inovace a posiluje kybernetickou bezpečnost. Vedení pod mořem jsou důležitá infrastruktura, Západ se bojí jejího narušení. Vědci zkoumali, jak umělá inteligence dokáže v textu rozpoznávat lidské emoce. Huawei: Společně pro ekologičtější a inteligentnější budoucnost v Evropě. Nový Red Hat OpenShift AI zvyšuje škálovatelnost a přizpůsobivost umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Vedení pod mořem jsou důležitá infrastruktura, Západ se bojí jejího narušení

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 47/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Podivná neutronová hvězda vyvolává nejistotu. Dvě vrstvy atomů dostali do blízkosti 50 nanometrů. Práškový diamant by mohl v magnetické rezonanci nahradit gadolinium. Syntéza kvalitního grafenu vyžaduje prostředí bez stop kyslíku.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Vědci dokázali vyladit Casimirovu sílu pomocí magnetického pole

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pomocí DNA vyrobili diamantové fotonické krystaly. Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury. AWS Cloud Day Prague 2024. Synology Experience Day 2024. Pure Storage zjednodušuje migraci podnikových prostředí VMware do cloudu Microsoft Azure. Chris Keller z AWS přiblížil na Cloud Day Prague novinky.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Chemie ultratěžkých prvků moscovia (115) a nihonia (113) má souviset s relativistickými efekty. Navrhují vznik temné energie v černých dírách. Kvantové provázání přežije i chemickou reakci. Ničení nebezpečných objektů jejich stáhnutím do atmosféry. Temná hmota by mohla hvězdám zajistit nesmrtelnost.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Magický grafen může být supravodivý jen do 60 K

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 46/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Máme zde výprodej na Black Friday a ceny od Dckeyoffer jsou opravdu skvělé když sháníte originální doživotní licence na Windows. Během výprodeje na Black Friday máme vysoké slevy na platné licence na Windows a Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Při výprodeji Black Friday je doživotní licence Windows 11 jen za €20, za Office €24

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 24.11 linuxové distribuce NixOS (Wikipedie). Její kódové označení je Vicuña. Podrobný přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání. O balíčky se v NixOS stará správce balíčků Nix.
articles.title: NixOS 24.11 Vicuña

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Neziskové průmyslové konsorcium Khronos Group vydalo verzi 1.4 specifikace Vulkan (Wikipedie), tj. standardu specifikujícího multiplatformní výpočetní a grafické API pro přístup k GPU. Vývojáři open source 3D knihovny Mesa už pracují na podpoře (Nvidia NVK, Radeon RADV, Apple Honeykrisp, …).
articles.title: Khronos vydal Vulkan 1.4

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Dolphin (Wikipedie), tj. open source multiplatformní emulátor herních konzolí GameCube a Wii od Nintenda, byl vydán ve verzi 2412.
articles.title: Emulátor Dolphin 2412

articles.author: bkralik
articles.description:
Zajímáte se o techniku, ale nemáte ve svém okolí s kým si o ní pokecat? Pak doražte 3. 12. na strahováckou Virtuální Bastlírnu, kde si můžete neformálně online popovídat s ostatními makery, hackery, hardwaráři, softwaráři, ale třeba i vědci a vysokoškolskými učiteli. Samozřejmě pro případy, kdyby řeč stála, mají bastlíři nachystaná i aktuální témata k nastartování diskuze. Jaká to jsou pro prosinec?

Jako obvykle se dá začít žhavými novinkami, které se udály za poslední měsíc. Průša vydal novou tiskárnu Prusa Core One - co umí, kolik stojí a jak si vede ve srovnání s jinými CoreXY tiskárnami? Co nového umí FreeCAD 1.0 nebo jak to vypadá se změnou v licenční politice Altia? V NTK se otevřela nová polytechnická dílna pro studenty, ale i externí subjekty - co vše nabízí?

Ze světa hardwar…
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 45: Jak se pracuje s novým FreeCADem?

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Intel mění vedení. Pat Gelsinger skončil jako CEO.
articles.title: Intel mění vedení. Pat Gelsinger skončil jako CEO

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: V souvislosti s nárůstem falešných webových stránek, které se vydávají za oficiální webové stránky Portálu občana, Portálu identity občana nebo Portálu veřejné správy, se Digitální a informační agentura (DIA) rozhodla urychlit přechod Národní identitní autority na jednotnou státní doménu gov.cz a identitaobcana.cz tak přešla na identita.gov.cz [tisková zpráva].
articles.title: identitaobcana.cz přešla na identita.gov.cz

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 0.5.18 open source správce počítačových her na Linuxu Lutris (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek v oznámení na GitHubu. Instalovat lze také z Flathubu.
articles.title: Lutris 0.5.18

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: I letos vychází řada ajťáckých adventních kalendářů. Programátoři se mohou potrápit při řešení úloh z kalendáře Advent of Code 2024. Pro programátory v Perlu je určen Perl Advent Calendar 2024. Pro programátory v TypeScriptu Advent of TypeScript. Pro zájemce o kybernetickou bezpečnost je určen Advent of Cyber 2024…
articles.title: Ajťácké adventní kalendáře 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Organizace Software Freedom Conservancy (SFC) společně se svým členským projektem OpenWrt oznámila oficiální spuštění prodeje Wi-Fi routeru OpenWrt One vyrobeného ve spolupráci s Banana Pi. Cena je 89 dolarů nebo 68,42 dolarů jenom deska. Z každého prodeje jde 10 dolarů do fondu OpenWrt v Software Freedom Conservancy. Projekt OpenWrt představil plán na výrobu vlastního routeru letos v lednu při příležitosti 20. výročí projektu.
articles.title: Prodej routeru OpenWrt One oficiálně spuštěn

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Multiplatformní rogue-like hra Oaken je na portále GOG.com zdarma, akce trvá do 2. prosince.
articles.title: Hra Oaken na GOG zdarma

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Years ago when new OpenGL spec releases would occur, it could take months or years for the open-source Mesa drivers to catch-up in supporting the latest versions... Thankfully in the Vulkan space it continues to prove to be a very different story. As we've seen with prior Vulkan specs, today's Vulkan 1.4 spec release is greeted by same-day Mesa patches...
articles.title: NVK, RADV, & Other Mesa Drivers Ready With Launch Day Vulkan 1.4 Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Mir 2.19 is out today as the newest version of this Ubuntu/Canonical project making it easier for other desktops/environments to embrace Wayland support. This set of libraries for building Wayland-based shells has added a few new features with today's update...
articles.title: Mir 2.19 Released With Atomic KMS Platform Support, New Wayland Protocols

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As a lovely early Christmas present, The Khronos Group used SIGGRAPH Asia today for announcing the Vulkan 1.4 specification release...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.4 Released With More Extensions Mandated, Better 8K Rendering

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While the Linux 6.13 merge window just closed yesterday in landing all of the new features and functionality for that first kernel version of 2025, already for the Linux 6.14 kernel cycle to follow a feature was queued up early this morning in a TIP branch: AMD per-core energy counter support...
articles.title: AMD Per-Core Energy Counter Support Slated For Linux 6.14

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While Intel has been under much financial difficulties and as they pursue their build out of new fabs to better compete with TSMC, to much surprise Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger has retired effective today...
articles.title: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger Retires

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Building off the early October release of Qt 6.8 LTS, Qt 6.8.1 is out today with more than 550 fixes collected over the past two months...
articles.title: Qt 6.8.1 Toolkit Released With 550+ Bug Fixes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: An exciting merge today for the Radeon "RADV" Vulkan driver with next quarter's Mesa 25.0 is enabling Vulkan Video API support by default for AMD graphics having VCN 2.x and VCN 3.x hardware...
articles.title: Vulkan Video Now Enabled By Default For Radeon VCN2/VCN3 Hardware On Linux

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Llamafile 0.8.17 debuted this weekend as the newest version of this Mozilla research project for making it easy to distribute and run AI large language models (LLMs) within a single file. As implied by its name, Llamafile leverages Llama.cpp along with other open-source software into one consistent framework for helping to make single-file LLM executables a reality...
articles.title: Llamafile 0.8.17 Brings New Web UI For This Easy-To-Distribute AI LLM Framework

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Merged over the US holiday weekend was a big update to the Imagination PowerVR Vulkan driver code for Mesa 25.0... 71 patches in fact making up this merge request...
articles.title: Imagination Lands Big PowerVR Compiler Update In Mesa 25.0

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Olivier Fourdan has merged support for using the xdg-system-bell protocol by XWayland for dealing with "system bell" functionality for Wayland compositors supporting this newer protocol for ringing the system bell or otherwise implementing a visual indicator that a system bell type event may have been triggered...
articles.title: XWayland Lands Support For xdg-system-bell

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: During October the Steam Linux marketshare crawled back up to 2.0% while overnight Valve published the Steam Survey results for November 2024...
articles.title: Steam Survey Results For November 2024: Linux Gaming Marketshare Slightly Higher

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Lutris 0.5.18 is out today as the newest version of this open-source game manager for Linux systems to help with installing and playing a variety of games whether they be native Linux titles, emulated Windows games with the likes of Wine / Proton, or console emulated games and more. Lutris also continues integrating with the likes of Steam, GOG, Humble Bundle, and other online game services for providing a nice Linux gaming experience...
articles.title: Lutris 0.5.18 Linux Game Manager Brings Many Improvements

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As expected, this evening Linus Torvalds released Linux 6.13-rc1 to cap-off the two-week Linux 6.13 merge window. With Linux 6.13 comes many new features...
articles.title: Linux 6.13-rc1 Released With Many New Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the Xfce 4.20 Pre1 release from one month ago, Xfce 4.20 Pre2 is ready for testing ahead of the planned desktop release in two weeks...
articles.title: Xfce 4.20 Pre2 Released For Testing

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The turbostat utility that lives within the Linux kernel source tree for reporting CPU frequency/idle statistics and other metrics is gaining some new capabilities as part of the Linux 6.13 cycle...
articles.title: Turbostat Utility Lands New Features With Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: November was filled with interesting Linux benchmarks ranging from the Apple M4 testing kicking off to ongoing AMD Zen 5 benchmarks both for desktops and servers, a lot of exciting upstream kernel activity (and some drama...), and more. Even with the end of year holidays around, there remains new and original content on Phoronix each and every day. During November there were 250 original news articles on Phoronix along with another 14 Linux hardware reviews / multi-page featured-length benchmark articles...
articles.title: Apple M4, More AMD Zen 5 Benchmarks & Linux Kernel Drama From November

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: NVIDIA engineer Yonatan Maman posted a set of "request for comments" patches this Sunday to implement GPU Direct RDMA "P2P DMA" for device private pages. This is the latest in the effort by multiple vendors to allow more efficient data sharing between GPUs/accelerators and other devices like network adapters...
articles.title: NVIDIA's New Linux Patches For GPU Direct RDMA For Device-Private Pages

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Submitted today for the Linux kernel ahead of the Linux 6.13-rc1 release as part of the "x86/urgent" material is a fix for aging Zen 1 and Zen 2 processors where for the past year and a half they could potentially find very slow boot times...
articles.title: Linux Fixes Issue Where Applying AMD Zen1/Zen2 Microcode Updates Could Slow Boot Times

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Last night when writing about the Clang AutoFDO and Propeller optimization patches sent in for Linux 6.13 I had wondered whether Linus Torvalds would go through with the pull request given some of his past commentary around aggressive compiler optimizations... But to much delight, this evening Linus Torvalds has merged the Kbuild pull request that introduces Clang-based AutoFDO and Propeller compiler optimization support for allowing greater kernel performance out of tailored (profiled) workloads...
articles.title: Clang AutoFDO + Propeller Optimization Support Merged For Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: In what could be a wonderful holiday for the Linux desktop, it looks like the Wayland color management protocol might finally be close to merging after four years in discussion...
articles.title: Wayland Color Management Protocol Might Finally Be Close To Merging

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As an alternative to the GNOME System Monitor application for system monitoring, Resources has been in development as a currently unofficial, GNOME-aligned resource/hardware monitoring application written in the Rust programming language. Resources v1.7 was released on Friday and now has the ability to monitor NPU usage and other enhancements...
articles.title: Resources System Monitoring App For GNOME Now Displays NPU Usage

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: In addition to the USB updates and big staging flush merged yesterday for the Linux 6.13 kernel merge window, the "char/misc" pull was also honored for that catch-all of various kernel changes. With the char/misc pull there are some notable additions for those wanting to write kernel drivers within the Rust programming language...

Marvel Rivals is set to release on December 6, 2024, and to celebrate that, the developers are providing Twitch Drops for users. In case you don't know what Twitch Drops is, it is a way to earn free rewards just by watching streams of a particular game for the desired amount of time. Here's everything that you need to know about the Marvel Rivals Season 0 Twitch Drops.


All rewards of Marvel Rivals Season 0 Twitch Drops




Marvel Rivals will provide you with various cosmetics to celebrate the global release of the game as well as the commencement of Season 0. Here is the list of all rewards:



Magneto (Cosmic Collapse) Emote


Winter Stockings Spray


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Spray


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Costume


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Nameplate

Reward
How to unlock


Magneto (Cosmic Collapse) Emote
Tune in to the Marvel Rivals stream for two hours.


Winter Stockings Spray
Tune in to the Marvel Rivals stream for one hour.


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Spray
Tune in to the Marvel Rivals stream for 30 minutes.


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Costume
Tune in to the Marvel Rivals stream for four hours.


Magneto (Will of Galacta) Nameplate
Tune in to the Marvel Rivals stream for one hour.






Remember that you should watch the drop-enabled streams. Apparently, you can see "Drop" written in the stream title. Also, Winter Stockings Spray will be available from December 20, 2024. You can redeem the rest of the rewards after the commencement of Season 0 Twitch Drops.


Release date of Marvel Rivals Season 0 Twitch Drops


The Season 0 Twitch Drop will go live on December 6, 2024, and will end on December 31, 2024.

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Greek Potatoes in Disney Dreamlight Valley is a strange mix of potatoes and fruit in the same dish. While it does sound odd, this qualifies as a five-star meal that can help you get Dreamlight and other rewards.


Greek Potatoes Disney Dreamlight Valley ingredients


To create Greek Potatoes, you'll first need the Storybook Vale DLC installed in Disney Dreamlight Valley as this recipe is exclusive to it. After getting started in this new region of the game, here are all of the ingredients you'll need:



Potato


Garlic


Any fruit


Any spice


Salt Crystal




Screenshot by Destructoid


Screenshot by Destructoid



To find a Potato, head to the Forgotten Lands in the original Valley. You can buy the seeds or perhaps even the ingredient itself from Goofy's Stall. The seeds themselves are 55 Star Coins each. 


Garlic can also be found in the original Valley. This time, fast travel over to the Forest of Valor. You'll find it growing within the ground. Look out for a large green stalk and pick it up amongst the grass.  Any fruit and any spice would match the next two ingredients. For example, you can grab some blueberries from the Forest of Valor and Oregano from the Plaza. 


The last ingredient Salt Crystal is from Everafter. Get your fishing rod and cast the rod in the water outside of the ripples. You can also make Aquatic Escargot with a Salt Crystal.


Once you have all of the ingredients, head back to any cooking station at your house or Chez Remy. Place all of them in the pot and them it will create the Greek Potatoes dish. You can sell it to Goofy's Stall for around 439 Star Coins (depending on the ingredients you choose) and eat it for 1,486 Energy. 

The post How to make Greek Potatoes in Disney Dreamlight Valley appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to make Greek Potatoes in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.description:
Matchday 2 of the FC Pro Open brings yet another Mystery Nation objective set in EA FC 25, and you can get some bonus rewards by performing a simple task. 


Usually, a nation is revealed on stream, and you'll have to complete the objective set using an item from the nation. Doing so will help you to win bonus packs, and you should make sure to get it while the Thunderstruck promo is live. That said, let's take a look at what this week's mystery nation is, and what you'll have to do in order to unlock the rewards. 


EA FC 25 Pro Open Matchday 2 Mystery Nation


Before going into the correct nation, let's take a look at the objective and its task. 


"Score three goals using a Finesse Shot with a player from the mystery nation in any UT game mode. The nation's name will be hinted at during the FC Pro Open Matchday 2 broadcast."


So far, only one clue has been handed out - someone from the nation has won the Ballon d'Or. This actually narrows the possible results a lot, and players have also made certain guesses. It's been already cleared that the nations are neither Poland nor Uruguay. 


Based on the stream's events, it seems likely that the nation is also from Europe. That said, the available choices are plenty, given that so many nations have been represented on the winner's pedestal at the Ballon d'Or ceremony. 


Upon further updates, it was confirmed that the nation is Croatia. You'll have to score three Finesse shot goals using a Croatian player item. You can score in any game mode of your choice, and the objective can be completed over multiple games. 


Once done, you'll be rewarded with a Premium Electrum Players Pack for your efforts. 

The post EA FC 25 Pro Open Mystery Nation Matchday 2 revealed appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25 Pro Open Mystery Nation Matchday 2 revealed

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Ash Echoes was released worldwide in mid-November, and it offers a robust set of character choices.


When you're just getting started in the game, the characters you pick won't matter much. But like every gacha on the market, you'll want to stick to the following list to use your resources in the best fashion possible. That will help you build up a decent squad and use your in-game resources to build characters with the best long-run potential.


Ash Echoes Tier list


Characters in Ash Echoes are of three types - DPS, Buffers, and Supports. Ideally, you'll want to have a well-balanced team, which is arguably more important than the tier list. Having three S-tier DPS will end your adventures pretty fast, so always make sure to prioritize character types as well when it comes to team build…
articles.title: Ash Echoes Tier list of best characters (December 2024)

articles.author: Matt Jackson
articles.description:
GSC Game World has launched the first official patch for Stalker 2 and it brings more than 650 fixes. As well as fixing some smaller issues, patch 1.0.1 is said to remedy some of the game-breaking bugs that have beset the survival horror since its November 20 launch. GSC has also said that the patch fixes some balancing issues, including the nerfing of the infuriating Bloodsuckers.


A mixed launch


Stalker 2 has had a mixed launch. The title was first announced in 2010, following the launch of Call of Pripyat. However, GSC was shut down a year later before reopening to launch Cossacks 3 in 2014. In 2018, the team once again stated they were working on a Stalker sequel, titled Stalker 2: Heart of Chernobyl.


Since then, the Ukrainian studio has been hit by pandemics and Russia’s invasion…
articles.title: First Stalker 2 patch brings 650 fixes to the game

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
King Arthur: Legends Rise is now out on global, and you can enjoy a brand new gacha on your phones and PC. 


The game is now live on both Android and iOS, and you can also download the PC version using Netmarble's launcher. There's already a vast set of characters available at launch, and here's my tier list for them (based on early access performance). 


Complete King Arthur: Legends Rise tier list


Characters in King Arthur: Legends Rise are of different rarities, and they also play different roles. Additionally, certain characters offer buff when teamed up with their preferred choices. In short, building your best team won't be easy at all. However, it's always important to focus on the tier list to get the best use of your resources. 


King Arthur: Legends Rise S-tier


The S-tier …
articles.title: King Arthur: Legends Rise tier list (December 2024)

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Starseed: Asnia Trigger is the latest addition to the world of gacha titles, and the opening week has seen the introduction of some really interesting characters.


As with any gacha, you'll want to focus on getting a strong start, and that means selecting units that are relatively overpowered in the early days. Doing so will help you clear out all the content quicker and earn more rewards in the process. During the opening week, I felt that the overall balance of the characters was decent, but some of them clearly stood out.


Starseed: Asnia Trigger tier list


To rank the characters, I have used four different tiers. While the SSR units are clearly better, you shouldn't sleep on some of the more commonly available girls as well.



S-tier: Absolutely broken units in the current meta.


…

Heaven Burns Red is the latest addition to the world of global gachas, and there are plenty of characters to pick from at launch. 


Like every gacha, you'll be relying mostly on the banners to get your share of characters to aid your team construction. While I found most of the characters pretty well-balanced, certain ones are better than others. Investing in them will make it the best possible use of your resources, and you will be one step closer to reaching the endgame quickly. 


Heaven Burns Red tier list


It's important to note that characters in Heaven Burns Red have different versions, so you'll want to avoid getting confused about different versions. To separate the characters, I have used four different tiers. 



S-tier characters are the very best units to include in your tea…
articles.title: Heaven Burns Red Tier list of best characters (December 2024)

articles.description:
Your biggest concern as you progress in Fisch is money, as getting new rods and enchanting them will siphon almost all of it. However, some things, including a secret rod, require you to level up to unlock them. Learn how to earn exp and reach max level fast with our definitive Fisch Roblox leveling guide!
